Package mcknighte.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AppointmentController
    AppointmentController, controller class to act as middle man between Appointment views and the business logic
    AppointmentConverter
    AppointmentConverter class to handle conversion to/from Appointment objects
    ClientController
    ClientController, controller class to act as middle man between Client views and the business logic
    ClientConverter
    ClientConverter class to handle conversion to/from Client objects
    LoginController
    LoginController, controller class to handle logging into the application, some navigation and keeping track of the logged in client
    NewPasswordValidator
    New password validator, to ensure that if a new password is being used, that it meets the relevant criteria
    PhoneValidator
    Phone validator, to ensure that if a phone number is being provided, that it meets the relevant criteria
    PostcodeValidator
    Postcode validator, to ensure that the postcode is valid only if the user's country is set to "United Kingdom"
    StartController
    StartController, used to handle navigation and the setup feature (which will create all necessary data to run the application while in development)
